name: ZUMA: Woody Edition
description:
Do you miss Zuma Deluxe? We're you a kid who once played this game and enjoyed it? Do you STILL enjoy it to this day? Well, you can have Zuma: Woody Edition for FREE!

Zuma Woody Edition. Well, it's Zuma Deluxe, but with a few changes here and there. Now you get the chance to bring your nostalgia back!

Changes will be made on levels, sounds and images.

All credits go to PopCap and the developers of the original Zuma Deluxe.
